title: How to Duplicate Items in Pokémon Red or Blue

steps.title: Get the item you want to duplicate and put it in the sixth item slot of your bag/inventory.
steps.content: Get the item you want to duplicate and put it in the sixth item slot of your bag/inventory.

steps.title: Fly to Viridian City and walk north until you reach an old guy.
steps.content: Fly to Viridian City and walk north until you reach an old guy. Talk to him and when he asks you if you're in a hurry, say "No". He'll then show you how to catch Pokémon. Watch him do it.

steps.title: Fly to Cinnabar Island and surf on the right side of the island until you find Missingno.
steps.content: Fly to Cinnabar Island and surf on the right side of the island until you find Missingno. (Just a bunch of glitchy-looking blocks).

steps.title: Fight it and after you win, the item in the sixth slot will have a glitch box instead of a number.
steps.content: Fight it and after you win, the item in the sixth slot will have a glitch box instead of a number.
